CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "4. Samuel Chernoff of Chernoff Furniture Company presents an RCA Victor 45 RPM record player to winner, Mrs. Blanche Keys, 78 Arthur St."
TitMainTitle: Samuel Chernoff presenting record player to winner Blanche Keys, in Hamburg Brothers booth for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair in Syria Mosque
